meanings.definition: Resembling zinc in appearance or properties.
meanings.sent1: The zincky metal had a shiny and metallic look.
meanings.sent2: The new roof had a zincky color that stood out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The zincky paint made the old car look like a futuristic spaceship.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as zincky as a polished silver coin.
meanings.sent5: The zincky texture felt smooth and cool to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The zincky alloy was strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The water from the well had a zincky taste.
meanings.sent3: The zincky bracelet sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a zincky quality that echoed in the room.
meanings.sent5: The zincky scent reminded her of fresh metal shavings.

meanings.sent1: The zincky surface of the gate prevented rust.
meanings.sent2: The zincky layer protected the steel from corrosion.
meanings.sent3: The zincky coating on the fence made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: Her shoes left zincky footprints on the wet pavement.
meanings.sent5: The zincky finish on the car gleamed under the streetlights.
